verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> had said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Now the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַבְרָ֔ם <S%H87><s%> unto Abram לֶךְ־ <S%H1980><s%> Go לְךָ֛ מֵאַרְצְךָ֥ <S%H776><s%> of thy country וּמִמּֽוֹלַדְתְּךָ֖ <S%H4138><s%> and from thy kindred וּמִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִ֑יךָ <S%H1><s%> and from thy father's אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto a land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אַרְאֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H7200><s%> that I will shew

וְאֶֽעֶשְׂךָ֙ <S%H6213><s%> And I will make of thee לְג֣וֹי <S%H1471><s%> nation גָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> a great וַאֲבָ֣רֶכְךָ֔ <S%H1288><s%> and I will bless וַאֲגַדְּלָ֖ה <S%H1431><s%> great שְׁמֶ֑ךָ <S%H8034><s%> thy name וֶהְיֵ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> shall be a בְּרָכָֽה׃ <S%H1293><s%> and thou shalt be a blessing

וַאֲבָֽרֲכָה֙ <S%H1288><s%> And I will bless מְבָ֣רְכֶ֔יךָ <S%H1288><s%> them that bless וּמְקַלֶּלְךָ֖ <S%H7043><s%> him that curseth אָאֹ֑ר <S%H779><s%> thee and curse וְנִבְרְכ֣וּ <S%H1288><s%> be blessed בְךָ֔ כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת <S%H4940><s%> thee and in thee shall all families הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <S%H127><s%> of the earth

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went אַבְרָ֗ם <S%H87><s%> So Abram כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after דִּבֶּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> had spoken אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> forth יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went אִתּ֖וֹ <S%H854><s%> to him ל֑וֹט <S%H3876><s%> unto him and Lot וְאַבְרָ֗ם <S%H87><s%> with him and Abram בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old חָמֵ֤שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and five שָׁנִים֙ <S%H8141><s%> years וְשִׁבְעִ֣ים <S%H7657><s%> was seventy-five שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years בְּצֵאת֖וֹ <S%H3318><s%> when he departed מֵחָרָֽן׃ <S%H2771><s%> out of Haran

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> took אַבְרָם֩ <S%H87><s%> And Abram אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׂרַ֨י <S%H8297><s%> Sarai אִשְׁתּ֜וֹ <S%H802><s%> his wife וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ל֣וֹט <S%H3876><s%> and Lot בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son אָחִ֗יו <S%H251><s%> his brother's וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all רְכוּשָׁם֙ <S%H7399><s%> and all their substance אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which רָכָ֔שׁוּ <S%H7408><s%> that they had gathered וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנֶּ֖פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> and the souls אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which עָשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> that they had gotten בְחָרָ֑ן <S%H2771><s%> in Haran וַיֵּצְא֗וּ <S%H3318><s%> and they went forth לָלֶ֙כֶת֙ <S%H1980><s%> for אַ֣רְצָה <S%H776><s%> into the land כְּנַ֔עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> they came אַ֥רְצָה <S%H776><s%> and into the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan

וַיַּעֲבֹ֤ר <S%H5674><s%> passed through אַבְרָם֙ <S%H87><s%> And Abram בָּאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land עַ֚ד <S%H5704><s%> far מְק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> unto the place שְׁכֶ֔ם <S%H7927><s%> of Sichem עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> far אֵל֣וֹן <S%H436><s%> unto the plain מוֹרֶ֑ה <S%H4176><s%> of Moreh וְהַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֖י <S%H3669><s%> And the Canaanite אָ֥ז <S%H227><s%> [was] then בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> in the land

וַיֵּרָ֤א <S%H7200><s%> appeared יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַבְרָ֔ם <S%H87><s%> unto Abram וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said לְזַ֨רְעֲךָ֔ <S%H2233><s%> Unto thy seed אֶתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> will I give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> land הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> this וַיִּ֤בֶן <S%H1129><s%> and there builded שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> there מִזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> he an altar לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD הַנִּרְאֶ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> who appeared אֵלָֽיו׃ <S%H413><s%> then

וַיַּעְתֵּ֨ק <S%H6275><s%> And he removed מִשָּׁ֜ם <S%H8033><s%> there הָהָ֗רָה <S%H2022><s%> from thence unto a mountain מִקֶּ֛דֶם <S%H6924><s%> on the east לְבֵֽית־ אֵ֖ל <S%H1008><s%> of Bethel וַיֵּ֣ט <S%H5186><s%> and pitched אָהֳלֹ֑ה <S%H168><s%> his tent בֵּֽית־ אֵ֤ל <S%H1008><s%> [having] Bethel מִיָּם֙ <S%H3220><s%> on the west וְהָעַ֣י <S%H5857><s%> and Hai מִקֶּ֔דֶם <S%H6924><s%> on the east וַיִּֽבֶן־ <S%H1129><s%> and there he builded שָׁ֤ם <S%H8033><s%> and there מִזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <S%H4196><s%> an altar לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וַיִּקְרָ֖א <S%H7121><s%> and called בְּשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> upon the name יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD
וַיִּסַּ֣ע <S%H5265><s%> journeyed אַבְרָ֔ם <S%H87><s%> And Abram הָל֥וֹךְ <S%H1980><s%> going on וְנָס֖וֹעַ <S%H5265><s%> still הַנֶּֽגְבָּה׃ <S%H5045><s%> toward the south פ

וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> now there was רָעָ֖ב <S%H7458><s%> And there was a famine בָּאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land וַיֵּ֨רֶד <S%H3381><s%> went down אַבְרָ֤ם <S%H87><s%> and Abram מִצְרַ֙יְמָה֙ <S%H4714><s%> into Egypt לָג֣וּר <S%H1481><s%> to sojourn שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> there כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for כָבֵ֥ד <S%H3515><s%> [was] grievous הָרָעָ֖ב <S%H7458><s%> there for the famine בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> in the land

וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> came כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> And it came to pass when הִקְרִ֖יב <S%H7126><s%> he was come near לָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> to enter מִצְרָ֑יְמָה <S%H4714><s%> into Egypt וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> that he said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שָׂרַ֣י <S%H8297><s%> unto Sarai אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <S%H802><s%> his wife הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> now יָדַ֔עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> I know כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for אִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H802><s%> woman יְפַת־ <S%H3303><s%> that thou [art] a fair מַרְאֶ֖ה <S%H4758><s%> to look upon אָֽתְּ׃ <S%H859><s%> you

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> become כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> and when יִרְא֤וּ <S%H7200><s%> shall see אֹתָךְ֙ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּצְרִ֔ים <S%H4713><s%> Therefore it shall come to pass when the Egyptians וְאָמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> thee that they shall say אִשְׁתּ֣וֹ <S%H802><s%> This [is] his wife זֹ֑את <S%H2063><s%> and they וְהָרְג֥וּ <S%H2026><s%> and they will kill אֹתִ֖י <S%H853><s%> וְאֹתָ֥ךְ <S%H853><s%> יְחַיּֽוּ׃ <S%H2421><s%> me but they will save thee alive

אִמְרִי־ <S%H559><s%> Say נָ֖א <S%H4994><s%> I pray thee אֲחֹ֣תִי <S%H269><s%> thou [art] my sister אָ֑תְּ <S%H859><s%> you לְמַ֙עַן֙ <S%H4616><s%> that יִֽיטַב־ <S%H3190><s%> it may be well לִ֣י בַעֲבוּרֵ֔ךְ <S%H5668><s%> because וְחָיְתָ֥ה <S%H2421><s%> shall live נַפְשִׁ֖י <S%H5315><s%> with me for thy sake and my soul בִּגְלָלֵֽךְ׃ <S%H1558><s%> because of thee

וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> came כְּב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> was come אַבְרָ֖ם <S%H87><s%> And it came to pass that when Abram מִצְרָ֑יְמָה <S%H4714><s%> into Egypt וַיִּרְא֤וּ <S%H7200><s%> beheld הַמִּצְרִים֙ <S%H4713><s%> the Egyptians אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָ֣אִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> the woman כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יָפָ֥ה <S%H3303><s%> fair הִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> he מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> that she [was] very

וַיִּרְא֤וּ <S%H7200><s%> saw אֹתָהּ֙ <S%H853><s%> שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> The princes פַרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> also of Pharaoh וַיְהַֽלְל֥וּ <S%H1984><s%> her and commended אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> her before פַּרְעֹ֑ה <S%H6547><s%> Pharaoh וַתֻּקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> was taken הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> and the woman בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <S%H6547><s%> into Pharaoh's

וּלְאַבְרָ֥ם <S%H87><s%> Abram הֵיטִ֖יב <S%H3190><s%> well בַּעֲבוּרָ֑הּ <S%H5668><s%> her sake וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> and gave ל֤וֹ צֹאן־ <S%H6629><s%> for her sake and he had sheep וּבָקָר֙ <S%H1241><s%> and oxen וַחֲמֹרִ֔ים <S%H2543><s%> and he asses וַעֲבָדִים֙ <S%H5650><s%> and menservants וּשְׁפָחֹ֔ת <S%H8198><s%> and maidservants וַאֲתֹנֹ֖ת <S%H860><s%> and she asses וּגְמַלִּֽים׃ <S%H1581><s%> and camels

וַיְנַגַּ֨ע <S%H5060><s%> plagued יְהוָ֧ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פַּרְעֹ֛ה <S%H6547><s%> Pharaoh נְגָעִ֥ים <S%H5061><s%> plagues גְּדֹלִ֖ים <S%H1419><s%> with great וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> and his house עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because דְּבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> because of שָׂרַ֖י <S%H8297><s%> Sarai אֵ֥שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife אַבְרָֽם׃ <S%H87><s%> Abram's

וַיִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> called פַרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> And Pharaoh לְאַבְרָ֔ם <S%H87><s%> Abram וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What זֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> you עָשִׂ֣יתָ <S%H6213><s%> What [is] this [that] thou hast done לִּ֑י לָ֚מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הִגַּ֣דְתָּ <S%H5046><s%> unto me? why didst thou not tell לִּ֔י כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אִשְׁתְּךָ֖ <S%H802><s%> ess הִֽוא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

לָמָ֤ה <S%H4100><s%> Why אָמַ֙רְתָּ֙ <S%H559><s%> Why saidst thou אֲחֹ֣תִי <S%H269><s%> other הִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> he וָאֶקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> take אֹתָ֛הּ <S%H853><s%> לִ֖י לְאִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> her to me to wife וְעַתָּ֕ה <S%H6258><s%> then הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> here אִשְׁתְּךָ֖ <S%H802><s%> now therefore behold thy wife קַ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> take וָלֵֽךְ׃ <S%H1980><s%> her and go

וַיְצַ֥ו <S%H6680><s%> commanded עָלָ֛יו <S%H5921><s%> concerning פַּרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> And Pharaoh אֲנָשִׁ֑ים <S%H376><s%> men וַֽיְשַׁלְּח֥וּ <S%H7971><s%> concerning him and they sent him away אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <S%H802><s%> and his wife וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after לֽוֹ׃
